snippet: Egypt’s Muslim Brotherhood is committed to upholding patriarchal and traditional values around a woman’s place in society, and many Egyptian women need no convincing.
abstract: Egypt's Muslim Brotherhood is committed to upholding patriarchal and traditional values about a woman’s place in society; in a country where a vast majority of women already cover their hair and voluntarily separate from men in coed environments, many Egyptian women need no convincing.
lead_paragraph: Egypt’s Muslim Brotherhood is committed to upholding patriarchal and traditional values around a woman’s place in society, and many Egyptian women need no convincing.

headline.main: Family Life According to the Brotherhood
headline.print_headline: Extolling Female Subservience, And Adding Followers in Egypt
